text: Şefik Yılmaz Dizdar (born 1938) is a Turkish billionaire businessman, one of the owners of LC Waikiki, a Turkish producer and retailer of clothing and homewares, with 700 stores in 34 countries, and annual sales of over $2 billion. His brother Vahap Kucuk, is the CEO and spokesman of LC Waikiki. Dizdar is married, and lives in Istanbul, Turkey. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish billionaires Category:Turkish businesspeople
title: Şefik Yılmaz Dizdar
